description:
A young boy who was raised by elderly doctor http://anidb.net/ch42354 [Toshio]. His father is missing and his mother also left him ten years ago, on the occasion of a certain "accident".
Due to his complex background, he used to suppress parts of his inner self for his entire life, but his encounter with http://anidb.net/ch41250 [Nirvash] will make him know his destiny and abilities, and he will take his life in own hands.
Source: ANN
name: Fukai Ao
